body_html:
+1.
I think CMake's the most viable choice. KDevelop and CLion support CMake projects. CMake also has a separate GUI program. It'd make development easier.
See KDevelop 5 features.

body:
+1.
I think CMake's the most viable choice. KDevelop and CLion support CMake projects. CMake also has a separate GUI program. It'd make development easier.
See [KDevelop 5 features](https://www.kdevelop.org/news/first-beta-release-kdevelop-500-available).
